queries.query: SELECT c.seat_id, se.seat_number FROM tickets t JOIN cinema_infos c ON t.cinema_info_id = c.cinema_info_id JOIN schedules s ON s.schedule_id = c.schedule_id JOIN seats se ON se.seat_id = c.seat_id WHERE t.cancel_status = 'N' AND s.schedule_id = ?
SELECT s.seat_id, s.seat_number FROM seats s WHERE s.seat_number = ?;
